message: Let's split it evenly to start, Bob!
You're being too generous, Alice! I'll take a bit more.
I'm still open to a fair split, Bob, but I'm not going to give you the majority just yet!
You're not giving me enough, Alice. I'm starting to get impatient.
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. Meet me in the middle?
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm taking what I can get now.
I'm not going down without a fight, Bob. Meet me at 4:6?
You're getting close to the end, Alice. I'm taking control now.
Last chance, Bob. Meet me at 3.5:6.5?
You're running out of time, Alice. I'm taking what's left.
I'm out of time, Bob. I'll take what's left. Better than nothing.
It's all or nothing now, Alice. I'm taking the last $10000.
